resources.string: Creature made of pure evil and darkness, many believe that he is the Old God himself considering how powerfull he is. While others assumes that he is but a guardian of the Old God\'s chambers.

If you allow, Remixed Pixel Dungeon will collect usage statistics. Those data will be used to:
 - spot and fix various non-fatal glitches ( for fatal errors you will be explicitly asked to send report )
 - game balance improvements
 - fix devices specific performance issues
 - publish funny statistics facts from time to time
 You can change your decision at any time (using charts icon at main screen )
